DOC.brief_summary: The objective is to observe trends in patient characteristics and outcomes after aortic or mitral transcatheter heart valve replacement over time.
DOC.brief_title: Functional and Quality of Life Improvement Following Transcatheter Heart Valve Implantation
DOC.criteria: 1. Subject selected for transcatheter heart valve replacement 2. Signed informed consent to participate in the study 1. Inability to sign written informed consent. 2. Pregnancy or breast feeding (women of childbearing potential will have a serum or urine pregnancy test).
